products.title: Lux Butterscotch Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Amor Campfire Smoke Vertical Blind
products.description: The slightly darker grey colour of the amor campfire smoke is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern, darker grey colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and soft greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a blackout material so will block all of the light from passing through, making this a perfect blind for your bedroom.

products.title: Amor Pearl Vertical Blind
products.description: The amor pearl roller blind has a touch of cream to it, making this a very versatile colour. This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, kitchens and living rooms. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light.

products.title: Ritz Luxury Cream Vertical Blind
products.description: This vertical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being blackout, it is great for stopping any light from passing through the fabric - great for living rooms and bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
